description: Elevate the creepy factor on fright night with bleeding eyes (jam-filled lychees) in a raspberry spritz.
keywords: Non-alcoholic drink,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Low kilojoule,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Halloween,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Halloween Spritz Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a small spoon, insert jam into lychee cavity to fill. Gently push a blueberry into the middle of each jamfilled lychee with the dimple facing up to form the pupil of the eye. Repeat with remaining lychees.
Divide lychees among 4 glasses. Top with raspberry fanta and serve.
